info.title: Open Politica - Congreso - API
info.description: API para proyecto Congreso desarrollado para backend de Open Politica in Node.JS

get.summary: Returns information about congresspeople. If a query parameter is not defined, returns the complete list of congresspeople. Otherwise return the information about a specific congressperson. Accepts 'cv_id' and 'id_dni' as parameters, but in case are both provided, the cv_id takes precedence.

parameters.name: cv_id
parameters.description: Identificator of a specific congressperson through the cv_id value

parameters.name: id_dni
parameters.description: Identificator of a specific congressperson through the id_dni value
